website_summaries.verdict: This shoe receives high marks in a number of different categories, including support, stability, and comfort.
pros: Comes in a wide variety of colors
Praised for its instep/arch support, as well as stability
Soft leather adds to the comfort
cons: Some may find that there is a bit too much arch support here
Some customers report that the sizing is too small, and the shoe feels too narrow

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were 100% comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I play golf often and I always walk the course. These shoes were 100% comfortable right out of the box. I normally wear a size 10.5 shoe in American sizing and the size 44 fit me perfectly in length and width. I believe these are the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever owned. They also provide very good arch support. I have other Ecco shoes from prior years. I believe the arch support has been significantly improved in this model.
customer_reviews.author: Big Buyer

customer_reviews.title: You want room in the front of these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe I've ever worn in 35 years of golf ...i'm glad I watched a video of the designer of the shoes you want the toe area to have some room up at the front this is the way that shoe was designed... I thought mine was a half a size too big once I wore them on the course perfect fit this is the way the shoe is designed, best golf you will ever wear 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: great pair of shoes! The most comfortable shoes I've worn in a while. they are fairly light weight and provide good stable traction on the golf course. The shoes provide good stability from tee to green and during shot setup. Walk 18 holes and feet feel great. Shoes hold up well in damp conditions, have not tried in wet conditions. Shoes clean up nicely. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: RRob

customer_reviews.title: No more sore feet.
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 and like to walk the course with a push cart. I was experiencing foot soreness with soft spike shoes. These ECCOs solved that problem. They are more comfortable than my New Balance running shoes. The sole provides great stability. Expensive (I chose the color with the lowest price), but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BarryL

customer_reviews.title: New shoes, new feel
customer_reviews.text: They fit comfortably, and are easy to walk in. I have not played golf in them as yet, but they definitely have soft leather and a good amount of instep support. I would definitely buy more of them. UPDATE: I have now play a spring and summer's worth of golf in these shoes, They are undoubtedly the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn. My feet do not feel worn & tired at the end of a round. They can also be used as walking shoes since they do not have regular cleats installed. I purchased both the tan and black models, and love both sets of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reed

customer_reviews.title: These are nice looking and comfortable and are perfectly wearable as casual ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore these all over NYC on a recent visit in which we walked over ten miles a day sight-seeing. Then I golfed in them in New Jersey (36 holes in one day) on the way home. These are nice looking and comfortable and are perfectly wearable as casual street shoes. Like other Ecco golf shoes I have had, they are not quite as waterproof as say, Dry Joys, so I do not tend to wear these when I am expecting to slug though a soaked course. A little expensive but comfortable, functional, versatile, and good looking. I will buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say these shoes arrived promptly, very impressive shipping speed. The shoes were absolute brand new. They fit perfect. I've got to say these shoes are so comfortable on the golf course. No more soft cleats for me. These shoes you could use everyday even if you don't golf. Great support yet they feel like you're wearing slippers. These shoes are actually more comfortable than tennis shoes yet they have better traction on the ground IMHO. A little spendy, but you get what you pay for. Awesome sellers, 5+ in every way. I'm going to get another pair just for casual wear too. They are that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Super shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes? So why didn't I give them 5 stars? Because they appeared to have been worn by someone. Still, for the price I decided to keep them. I mean...the BIOM 2 is just a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Time Flies

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ecco hands down makes the most comfortable golf shoes on the planet. Expensive, but they wear like iron--I play on average 80 to 90 rounds a year and I just threw out my first pair after 5 years...Just wore them out. Used to buy FootJoy shoes--current spikeless models from them are stiff as boards--wouldn't even consider them now.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Breeding/ Chuck Breeding

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super comfortable. One of the most comfortable pairs of ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable. One of the most comfortable pairs of shoes that I've owned and certainly the best golf shoes. I bought a cheaper pair of Nike Golf Shoes but they made my feet sore after golfing all day. These shoes are crazy comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: globetrotter

customer_reviews.title: Both are comfortable shoes and can wear them without fatigue or soreness ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two pair of ECCO golf shoes, one is a 41 and the other (these) a 42. The 41 is snug without socks and the 42 is loose without socks.Both are comfortable shoes and can wear them without fatigue or soreness as with other golf shoes I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Basically the same as the original with a bit more traction. Comfortable and reliable. Have not tested it in wet conditions; the original Biom Hybrid was not great in really wet conditions. What I like is the removable liner which allows me to put my orthotics into the shoe; the toe box is also big enough so I don't bump my toes. My only problem with the Biom Hybrid line is that they do not clean up easily; it seems to take a good scrubbing with saddle soap to get the dirt and scuff marks out.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Good fit as usual for Ecco
customer_reviews.text: I'm a walker so my shoes are crucial. I almost always wear Ecco because the size is right for me and the shoes stay consistent. This pair fit the pattern. They fit, they're comfortable and they provide stable support during my swing
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Galka

customer_reviews.title: Maybe best golf shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Way more comfortable than most golf shoes, and they last a long time. I'm using a 6 year old pair of Eccos as gardening shoes, and I put a lot of rounds on them for the 3 years I used them for golf. Buy two pair and alternate using them - they last longer that way I think.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: best of the best
customer_reviews.text: extreme , high end , top line , top shelf , best of the best . amazing how this company manages to out do themselves , when no other company , brand or type comes anywheres near the quality build craftsmanship materials and design ecco makes for its customers, theses are the best yet. another ten star ☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: species

customer_reviews.title: My favorite golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement for another Ecco Golf shoe that hurt my feet. I had the Biom 1 Hybrids before the shoes mentioned. These do not hurt my feet. The are "broken in" when you first wear them. I will buy this model from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are are par
customer_reviews.text: Playing golf 20 + years I wish my game was equal to the quality of these shoes. Bought first pair of ecco golf shoes last year and now have three pairs. So light and comfortable and there was no break-in period.
customer_reviews.author: Bergen County Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are great fitting shoes. I owned an old pair and was worried that the sizing would change, as sizing changes with a lot of clothing and shoes these days. No problem though. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Even came with spare laces. Way more comfortable than most golf shoes, and they last a long time. I'm using a 6 year old pair of Eccos as gardening shoes, and I put a lot of rounds on them for the 3 years I used them for golf.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: One issue
customer_reviews.text: Just wiping with leather cleaner removes white finish. Not pleased
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: style and durability
customer_reviews.text: initially they were tight but now they are breaking in. Very comfortable, very supportive and I can actually walk a great deal without feet soreness. I am a big guy with tender feet.
customer_reviews.author: H. madden

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sleak looking shoes but be nice to them
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair and most comfortable shoes for golf. I would however not abuse this as the Yak leather seems to tear easier than normal tougher leather.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sayin

customer_reviews.title: Master Piece - Ecco Gets it Right Again
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a cousin of mine. He loves them! The sizing can be tricky because it’s European but these are one of the Cadillac’s of the golf shoe industry. Most of my family does Skechers those that don’t do ECCO.
customer_reviews.author: Intervention Confidential

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable when pushcarting 18 holes
customer_reviews.text: Very soft leather. Very comfortable when pushcarting 18 holes. Normally, I wear a size 10 3E width, but normal size 10 fit like a glove... shocker. Well made shoe. Solid feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Golf Shoe of all time
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves these golf shoes! Has had them for 2 years and they are STILL holding up great. Leather is actually Yak so it seems to last longer. These are his go to shoes!
customer_reviews.author: DMW96

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I use these year round. Comfortable and water proof. My feet feel great after 18 and I can wear them in the club house.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: With my full length orthotic in the golf shoe, the shoes were too tight got a blister..
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. I'm a size 13 With my full length orthotic in the golf shoe, the shoes were too tight got a blister.. Ordered them in size 14
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic golf shoe. If you haven't owned a pair of Ecco's, you should definitely try them. Very comfortable and wear very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoe I have ever worn!!!! Usually wear 10M in Footjoys, I wear 43 (9- 9.5) in Eccos. Also have the spike version. Use these for practice rounds and the spiked version for Tournament play. Both are The Most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn. Will only use Eccos now
customer_reviews.author: Nestor A

customer_reviews.title: CONDITION
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were absolutely filthy and showed signs of being wore more than what was explained in advertisement by Amazon warehouse deals......the reason I returned was wore and over priced
customer_reviews.author: Know it all

customer_reviews.title: Best fit ever.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe ever. I have a wide foot and have tried many different brands. I am an ECCO man for life. My shoe size is a 12. I opted for the 13-13 1/2. It is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: luk60

customer_reviews.title: What was not included in the shipment, see below:
customer_reviews.text: Previously when i bought this product, there was an additional pair of laces included. There were none in this box. Also, there was only one shoe tree included and of course there are usually two. Please send the above items to me. Thanks, Chris Sousoures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather feel, but the pair I received fit a little different. They were slightly tilted in on the soles. Maybe it is for balance, but they felt a little awkward. I returned them
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: ECCOs are the best golfing shoes I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: ECCOs are the best golfing shoes I've ever tried. I have 6 pairs of them and wouldn't change for the world.
customer_reviews.author: Blacknav66

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I bought these like I buy running shoes - a 1/2 size larger. I wore them to the course, played 18, then wore them home. Feet weren't sore at all. They do have a steep price tag for most, so that needs to be factored in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jachimo Caliendo

customer_reviews.title: never disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves ECCOs.. actually bought two pairs because he's afraid they may change this style. Been wearing ECCOs for years, never disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: P. Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials and well made. Very comfortable. I expect these shoes to last a long time and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes. Super comfortable and excellent grip
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes. Super comfortable and excellent grip. I typically wear an 11 but can fit into certain shoes at a 10 1/2. These are an example of that. I have many Ecco shoes and their 44 is a perfect fit for me. So, I would say these run a bit on the large side of 10 1/2. If you are in between 10 1/2 or 11, then I suggest you order the 10 1/2 (size 44 in Ecco). Great shoes though!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ECCO Golf
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6th pair of ECCO Biom golf shoes that I have purchased. Been playing golf for 53 years and these are by far the most comfortable golf shoe I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these, but they just are too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but they just are too uncomfortable. The position of the arch support makes it feel like it is under the front of your foot. I thought it was just a defect, so I ordered a replacement. Same issue was found in the replqcement pair. Returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: dannyp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several of these shoes and they have improved every time. Comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are no better golf shoes on the market
customer_reviews.text: There are no better golf shoes on the market. I have suffered for years from plantar fasciitis, and these shoes offer enough support in the arch to help! I love the style as well, and wish they made some street shoes with the same style. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tincupgamer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe - very long lasting. Still have them and wear them twice a week on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Always had good luck with Ecco shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always had good luck with Ecco shoes. Super comfortable. Great on the golf course. Some Ecco dress shoes run a little big, but these were dead on. You won't be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: shoe looses its dye color
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable but the dye started fading and is continuing to get worse. I keep a good coat of polish on them but it doesn't help. Never had a shoe loose its dye so quickly. Won't ever buy another Ecco shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V. Klauer

customer_reviews.title: i also like the reinforcing at the toe
customer_reviews.text: i have first generation Ecco Street, that these are replacing. those i now wear as casual shoes due to heel wear in the nubs. these are much more supportive. i also like the reinforcing at the toe. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David Canha

customer_reviews.title: These shoes not only look great but feel great to
customer_reviews.text: Have always used Ecco shoes because I have a wide food. These shoes not only look great but feel great to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... than the Adidads spikeless light shoe but much more comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Slightly heavier than the Adidads spikeless light shoe but much more comfortable and supportive. I have two artificial knees and have broken both tendons so I go for light shoes...These are near perfect
customer_reviews.author: Richard Turnley

customer_reviews.title: By far the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever owned. I have over 20 pairs of golf shoes from different manufacturers, and these are the most comfortable. So comfortable that when I left my running shoes at home on a weekend trip, I ran in these.
customer_reviews.author: AEF Schools

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, my third pair for work and pleasure. For golf I wear Ecco Cage which are great as well especially in rough weather.
customer_reviews.author: Cork Rebel

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing Ecco shoes for many years now. I really don't have to try them on. Any Ecco shoe in my size (European 41) fits perfectly, and any shoe I got from Ecco is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Werner Kuballa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, very light and stable. They also have a nice style.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G Kolbe

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. Best golf shoes I've owned. Have walked 36 holes a day several times. Never uncomfortable. Stable grip. Good in inclement weather. Wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Todd G.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I tried on the same shoes at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I tried on the same shoes at a local golf store to make sure I knew my size before ordering at a better price online, but fit is great and extremely comfortable. Have received lots of compliments as well.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: They are great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ecco Biom Hybrid 2. They are great right out of the box. I recently received a pair of Footjoys as a Member Guest Tee gift. I wore them four rounds and trashed them. I will never wear anything but ECCO’s.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He loves these. Great fit and water proof - he says, they are the best he has ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love Ecco!
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes out there! Extremely comfortable! I love playing in these! I wear their dress shoes everyday so it was just fitting to purchase these. I wish they we're waterproof but that's when I get my spikes out for extra traction.
customer_reviews.author: langer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great grip
customer_reviews.text: Walked my first 18 with these today and I love them. Everything inhale hopes for and more. Buying another pair tonight in a different color. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judge Smails

customer_reviews.title: Never a problem
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Ecco's for 20 years...primarily Seawalker Ties. This was my first Ecco golf shoe. Fit great out of the box and very comfortable. The only issue I have ever had with Ecco is that the shoes long outlast the laces. We will see on these.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: but so far they are as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for both street wear and golf so would not need an extra pair of shoes on golf trip. This color works well for me in both venues. I won't know for sure how they will do long term for a few more weeks, but so far they are as good as I had hoped. Tom from Virginia
customer_reviews.author: Tom Stevens

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe, not as comfy as i thought they'd ...
customer_reviews.text: nice shoe, not as comfy as i thought they'd be .. but after 3 rounds they seem to have broken in.. stylish good looking shoe..
customer_reviews.author: Lanurva Knowles

customer_reviews.title: I'm not the best golfer, but I have the best shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel great as soon as you put them on. You will notice the arch support immediately, as well as the flexibility of the shoe. And they look very stylish to match the quality of the design and build. Goodbye old golf shoes !!!
customer_reviews.author: Travel Bug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband walks 9 or 18 frequently and he loves the comfort of these golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: worth the $
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for my husband, who is an avid golfer. They are pricey, so this was a treat. But, he tells me how comfortable they are so frequently that it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sore feet after a round of golf, these shoe have helped quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and comfortable sole. The toe box is a little small on the outside edge, though.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: A great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: 4 pair (2 older, 2 of these newer). An improvement on an already most comfortable shoe. Occasionally find them for 50 less than full price.
customer_reviews.author: Mitt

customer_reviews.title: Simply an excellent all around experience with this shoe - as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Simply an excellent all around experience with this shoe - as advertised: comfortable, seemingly water-proof (only 'dew-tested' so far), very good grip even in that morning dew and sharp looking. As long as the fit is right for your foot, then cannot recommend this shoe enough.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred DuPuy

customer_reviews.title: I walk the golf course and they are just amazingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wear Ecco's to work and to play golf. I have always worn the same size and they are very consistent in fit...I have no hesitation about buying them online. I walk the golf course and they are just amazingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe made
customer_reviews.text: I have WAY too many Ecco shoes, both dress, golf and casual and every pair fits the same. Expensive but worth what you pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe and fit was excellent. My fourth pair of Ecco golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pairs of sport shoes I've ever owned, and comfortable too just for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Alex N.

customer_reviews.title: but in general I love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of ECCO Biom shoes. Ecco, because they use a European size system, have always been either a little large or a little small for me, but in general I love the shoes. Great combination of style, performance and quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Tsambasis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've played one round in these and it was great, very, very comfortable and not as "stiff" as a traditional golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: tcheckart22

customer_reviews.title: Awesome golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes straight out of the box are extremely comfortable. They are expensive, but worth every penny! The grip the soft spikes provide are superb as well. All around, this golf shoe cannot be beat, I am converted to ecco for life!
customer_reviews.author: eric wingate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, like wearing nothing at all. Hubby just got his friend to purchase same shoe. He loved it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes I wear them all the time golfing and they are very comfortable. My favorite brand!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box these Ecco's feel comfortable. I wish I could tell you that my ...
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box these Ecco's feel comfortable. I wish I could tell you that my score dropped a lot, but the shoes loot and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of box
customer_reviews.text: Had my last pair of Ecco Biom golf shoes for 6 years, so was time for a new pair. Received on Friday, played golf Sunday , really comfortable right out of the box. Bottoms on old pair showed little wear after 6 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Golf Shoes are perfect, and they are comfortable. My husband loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Marietta Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough to wear off the course, very high quality leather
customer_reviews.author: james cole

customer_reviews.title: Great looking got here quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great looking got here quickly. I had to use a stretcher for about 4 hours on each to fit my admittedly wide feet!
customer_reviews.author: Joel S

customer_reviews.title: wow these are comfortable. Lots of width which I like
customer_reviews.text: wow these are comfortable. Lots of width which I like. very easy to walk in and stand. Not as stable as a full on tour 360 shoe, but worth the trade off for the comfort and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Banana recommends

customer_reviews.title: Runs on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. I wear a size14 and ordered the 48. They were a little small. I would at these definitely run .5-1 size small. Too bad for me as they look to be of high quality. The refund/return process was painless.
customer_reviews.author: Robert shular

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Got these a couple of weeks ago, and have played three rounds so far. From the very first moment I put them on, they've been comfortable, very supportive, and provide great grip on the course!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to get the right fit, but after ordering and returning 2 pair, and finally exchanging the third, I got the right fit. These are great golf shoes. I have played several rounds and with a gel shoe pad, my feet are as fresh after 18 holes as when I started. Lots of support and looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit with size 43 . I wear a size 10 US street shoe. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: 600NOLA

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes...so very comfortable! Great wearing to the course and playing golf!
customer_reviews.author: William Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: ... pair of ECCO golf shoes and they are just perfect. The quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of ECCO golf shoes and they are just perfect. The quality, comfort and style is nothing short of exceptional. I would highly recommend ECCO golf shoes to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: D. Calik

customer_reviews.title: The best, most comfortable golf shoe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of ECCO Bioms. The best, most comfortable golf shoe I've ever owned. Price seems a little high, but you can't argue with comfort.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always played with foot joy, they always had to be broken in. These ECCO are step in Ready! Most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. Period.
customer_reviews.author: J Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf shoe ever.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe I have ever owned. No break in period. Good to go right out of the box. ** I did go with one size down due to European sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Walked for 8 hours and my tootsies feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Sudol

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe so far. I have a problem with the ball of my left foot, and these shoes seem to work well to lessen the pain. Toe box is wide enough, but not too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: ECCO has some of the best shoes. Great for walking all day on the coures. A little pricey, but u get what u psy for
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and more support than I thought. They will ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and more support than I thought. They will slip occasionally, however, on wet downhill lies or really dry grass - fescue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and great footing on the golf course! Bought my wife a pair first, she loved them, so you know they gotta be good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel good while wearing and good support. I will buy more when on sale. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are a comfortable fit and I like the appearance of the shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a comfortable fit and I like the appearance of the shoes. Overall I am pleased with the shoes. Ken Godsey
customer_reviews.author: Ken Godsey

customer_reviews.title: Bring back this model
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable golf shoe ever. Unfortunately it is no longer offered by Ecco. Wish they would bring it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jack J. Pelton

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Biom Hybrid 2 Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: ECCO is a European shoe company founded in Denmark in 1963. Today they own and operate factories throughout Europe and Asia. They produce all the leather used in making Ecco shoes, taking measures to protect the environment at the same time. Their sole aim is to make a comfortable walking shoe.
feature_bullets: A hybrid golf shoe that can be worn on and off the golf course
Weather Resistance - Naturally soft, breathable and strong yak leather uppers are treated with HYDROMAX and an anti-stain formula for superb protection from the elements
Anatomical Last Shape - Developed by scanning the feet of 2,500 athletes to provide ideal levels of support
Tour-Proven Traction - Constructed from TPU - a highly durable, wear-resistant material - the molded traction bars offer hundreds of traction angles for superb grip
Technical Insole System - A new, ultra-premium insole with silicon printing helps prevent unwanted foot movement during the swing
